description: These sticky wings have a pleasing sweetness, but make sure you have enough napkins on hand.
keywords: BBQ chicken,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: BBQ Chicken Wings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170Â°C. Bake the chicken wings on baking tray for 35 minutes.
While the wings are baking, put the rest of the ingredients in a pot on a medium heat and stir while simmering for 5 minutes or until the sugar melts and the sauce starts to reduce.
Remove sauce from the heat and set to one side. Remove the wings from the oven, drain excess liquid and then shallow fry a further 6 minutes.
Remove wings from the fryer and toss in the BBQ sauce before serving.
